Short Side-Swept Hairstyle (Female)
kDesc
Short and swept, this hair has some of that fever trend fused into it. [#Legal]
Une coupe courte légèrement dégradée très tendance. [#Legal]
Diese kurze, zur Seite gekämmte Frisur ist der letzte Schrei. [#Legal]
Capelli corti e pettinati di lato, di tendenza. [#Legal]
Corto y peinado hacia el lado, deja entrever que estás a la última en tendencias. [#Legal]
옆으로 흘린 짧은 헤어스타일입니다. 최첨단 패션이 녹아들어 있습니다. [#Legal]
Short and swept, this hair has some of that fever trend fused into it. [#Legal]
梳到兩旁的短髮髮型，總是大受歡迎。 [#Legal]
